Elements

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Descriptions

Semantically group related terms and details using description lists.

Clarification

The description list tag, dl, is used to define a description list.

Add a description term tag, dt, to represent a term to be defined.

Use the description details tag, dd, after a description term to describe it. Note that a single definition may be used for multiple terms.

Description Term 1
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Description Term 2
Description Term 3
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Description Term 4
Description Term 5
Description Term 6
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
<dl>
    <dt>Description Term 1</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>

    <dt>Description Term 2</dt>
    <dt>Description Term 3</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>
    
    <dt>Description Term 4</dt>
    <dt>Description Term 5</dt>
    <dt>Description Term 6</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>
</dl>

Styles

Effortlessly change the look of your descriptions using these classes.

Indented

Use the .indented class to indent each description definitions.
Indented Term 1
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Indented Term 2
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Indented Term 3
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
<dl class="indented">
    <dt>Indented Term 1</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>

    <dt>Indented Term 2</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>
    
    <dt>Indented Term 3</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>
</dl>

Dividers

Use the .dividers class to seperate each definition with one of boba's dividers.
Divided Term 1
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Divided Term 2
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Divided Term 3
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
<dl class="dividers">
    <dt>Divided Term 1</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>

    <dt>Divided Term 2</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>
    
    <dt>Divided Term 3</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>
</dl>

Combinations

Combine both the .indented class and the .dividers class to create the perfect descriptions.
Combination Term 1
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Combination Term 2
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Combination Term 3
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
<dl class="indented dividers">
    <dt>Combination Term 1</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>

    <dt>Combination Term 2</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>

    <dt>Combination Term 3</dt>
    <dd>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</dd>
</dl>
